{{Infobox person | name = Morgan Lily |image = |imagesize = | birthname = Morgan Lily Gross | birth_date = {{birth date and age|2000|4|11}} | birth_place = [[Santa Monica, California|Santa Monica]], California, US | occupation = Actress/Model | yearsactive = 2005âpresent | death_date = | othername = | homepage = http://morganlily.com }} '''Morgan Lily''' (born April 11, 2000) is an American [[child actress|actress]] and fashion [[child model|model]]. She started modeling internationally at four years old and appeared in more than 21 television commercials, and many [[photo shoots]] before her role in ''[[Henry Poole Is Here]]'' as Millie Stupek. Lily had supporting roles in ''[[He's Just Not That into You (film)|He's Just Not That Into You]]'', as [[Matthew Gray Gubler]]'s daughter in ''Pornstar''. Her most notable role has been as Lilly Curtis in the apocalyptic film ''[[2012 (film)|2012]]''.<ref>{{cite journal | url=http://www.variety.com/article/VR1117989989.html?categoryid=28&cs=1 | title=Morgan Lily | journal=[[Variety (magazine)|Variety]] | date=August 3, 2008 | accessdate=October 29, 2008 }}</ref> She acted as young Julianna Baker in the film ''[[Flipped (film)|Flipped]]'' based on the ''[[Flipped|novel]]'' with the same name<ref>http://www.reelaccess.com/talent/morganlily/</ref> by Wendelin van Draanen and as young [[Mystique (comics)|Mystique]] in ''[[X-Men: First Class]]''.<ref>{{cite web|last=Dorn|first=Alex|url=http://www.hitfix.com/blogs/motion-captured/posts/oliver-platt-will-be-man-in-black-in-x-men-first-class|title=Oliver Platt will be The Man In Black in 'X-Men: First Class'|publisher=HitFix.com|accessdate=August 17, 2010|date=August 16, 2010}}</ref> Morgan recently co-starred as Missy in the Hallmark Channel's film, ''[[Love's Everlasting Courage]]''.
==Personal life== Lily was born '''Morgan Lily Gross''' in [[Santa Monica, California|Santa Monica]], California, and is a middle child of 4. She has an older brother, Jordan David, who is also an actor,<ref>http://www.imdb.com/name/nm1824246/</ref> a younger sister, Riley Jane, who is a [[child model]] and a baby sister, Audrey Lynn. Her mother, April Gross, is a stay-at-home mom and her father, Andy Gross, is a [[ventriloquist]] and [[Magic (illusion)|magician]]. He owns his own company called LA Magic & Toy and MindBoggling The Show and travels doing illusion shows and stand up comedy. He has performed as a magician at the world famous [[Magic Castle]]. Lily also enjoys being a ventriloquist and a magician and has been seen at the [[Magic Castle]] in Hollywood several times.
==Filmography== Morgan began her acting career at an early age, her beginnings include in the 2005 drama film ''Shards'' where she played Morgan, and in a TV movie ''Welcome to the Jungle Gym'' (2006) where she played Kylie. On 2007, she guest stared in ''[[CSI: Crime Scene Investigation]]'' as Chloe, which led her more opportunities such as a co-starring role at only 7 years old, her first theatrical film ''[[Henry Poole Is Here]]'' she portrayed Millie Stupek. Morgan's most notable role so far has been in the 2009 disaster film ''[[2012 (film)|2012]]'' as Lilly Curtis alongside young actor [[Liam James]]. Morgan's current projects up-to-date include ''[[Love's Everlasting Courage]]'' alongside high-profile actors [[Wes Brown]] and [[Cheryl Ladd]] and ''[[X-Men: First Class]]'' as Young Raven (10 yr.
